rulings.text: If a card or token enters as a copy of a permanent, the new permanent isn't kicked, even if the original was.
If a spell's kicker cost was paid, the spell is "kicked."
If you copy a kicked spell on the stack, the copy is also kicked. If the copied spell is a permanent spell, the token the copy of that spell becomes when it enters is also kicked.
If you put a permanent with a kicker ability onto the battlefield without casting it, you can't kick it.
The kicker ability doesn't let you pay a kicker cost more than once.

To determine a spell's total cost, start with the mana cost (or an alternative cost if another card's effect allows you to pay one instead), add any cost increases (such as kicker), then apply any cost reductions. The spell's mana value remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.

mainBoard.text:

Trample
If this creature was kicked, it enters with five +1/+1 counters on it.

rulings.text: Can never affect the colored part of the cost.
If a spell is both red and white, you pay {1} less, not {2} less.
If this card is sacrificed to pay part of a spell’s cost, the cost reduction still applies.
The effect is cumulative.

The generic X cost is still considered generic even if there is a requirement that a specific color be used for it. For example, “only black mana can be spent this way”. This distinction is important for effects which reduce the generic portion of a spell’s cost.
The lower cost is not optional like with some other cost reducers.
This can lower the cost to zero, but not below zero.

mainBoard.text: Red spells and white spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

mainBoard.name: Assault // Battery
mainBoard.originalText: Assault deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

rulings.text: A split card's characteristics are a combination of its two halves while it is not on the stack. For example, Assault // Battery has a mana value of 5 while it is in your library. If an effect allows you to search your library for a card with mana value 4 or less, you can't find Assault // Battery.
Each split card has two names. If an effect instructs you to choose a card name, you may choose one of those names, but not both.

Each split card is a single card. For example, if you discard a split card, you've discarded one card, not two. If an effect counts the number of sorcery cards in your graveyard, Assault // Battery counts once, not twice.

If an effect allows you to cast a spell with certain characteristics, consider only the characteristics of the half you're casting. For example, if an effect allows you to cast a sorcery spell with mana value 2 or less from among cards in your graveyard, you could cast Assault this way, but not Battery.
If you copy a spell that's half of a split card, the copy copies that same half. For example, if you copy Assault, the copy is also Assault, not Battery.
Split cards have two card faces on a single card. The characteristics of the half you didn't cast are ignored while the spell is on the stack.
To cast a split card, choose one of its halves to cast. There's no way to cast both halves of this split card.

mainBoard.text: Assault deals 2 damage to any target.

foreignData.text:
Bonus—Opfere zwei Länder. (Du kannst zusätzlich zwei Länder opfern, wenn Du diesen Zauberspruch spielst.)
Magmaausbruch fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler Deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu. Wenn Du die Bonuskosten bezahlt hast, fügt der Magmaausbruch einer weiteren Kreatur oder einem weiteren Spieler Deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu.

mainBoard.name: Magma Burst
mainBoard.originalText:
Kicker—Sacrifice two lands. (You may sacrifice two lands in addition to any other costs as you play this spell.)
Magma Burst deals 3 damage to target creature or player. If you paid the kicker cost, Magma Burst deals 3 damage to another target creature or player.

rulings.text: The second target must be different from the first one.
You choose a second target only if you choose to pay the Kicker cost.
If a card or token enters as a copy of a permanent, the new permanent isn't kicked, even if the original was.
If a spell's kicker cost was paid, the spell is "kicked."
If you copy a kicked spell on the stack, the copy is also kicked. If the copied spell is a permanent spell, the token the copy of that spell becomes when it enters is also kicked.
If you put a permanent with a kicker ability onto the battlefield without casting it, you can't kick it.
The kicker ability doesn't let you pay a kicker cost more than once.

To determine a spell's total cost, start with the mana cost (or an alternative cost if another card's effect allows you to pay one instead), add any cost increases (such as kicker), then apply any cost reductions. The spell's mana value remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.

mainBoard.text:
Kicker—Sacrifice two lands. (You may sacrifice two lands in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)
Magma Burst deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, it deals 3 damage to another target.

foreignData.name: Lave dévastatrice
foreignData.text:
Kick {R} (Vous pouvez payer {R} supplémentaires quand vous jouez ce sort.)
La Lave dévastatrice inflige 2 blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur. Si vous avez payé le coût de kick, cette créature ne peut pas être régénérée ce tour-ci et si elle devait être mise dans un cimetière ce tour-ci, retirez-la de la partie à la place.

foreignData.name: Sengende Lava
foreignData.text:
Bonus {R} (Du kannst zusätzlich {R} bezahlen, wenn Du diesen Zauberspruch spielst.)
Sengende Lava fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler Deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu. Wenn Du die Bonuskosten bezahlt hast, kann diese Kreatur in diesem Zug nicht regeneriert werden, und wenn sie in diesem Zug auf den Friedhof gelegt würde, entferne sie stattdessen ganz aus dem Spiel.

mainBoard.name: Scorching Lava
mainBoard.originalText:
Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you play this spell.)
Scorching Lava deals 2 damage to target creature or player. If you paid the kicker cost, that creature can't be regenerated this turn and if it would be put into a graveyard this turn, remove it from the game instead.

rulings.text: If a card or token enters as a copy of a permanent, the new permanent isn't kicked, even if the original was.
If a spell's kicker cost was paid, the spell is "kicked."
If you copy a kicked spell on the stack, the copy is also kicked. If the copied spell is a permanent spell, the token the copy of that spell becomes when it enters is also kicked.
If you put a permanent with a kicker ability onto the battlefield without casting it, you can't kick it.
The kicker ability doesn't let you pay a kicker cost more than once.

To determine a spell's total cost, start with the mana cost (or an alternative cost if another card's effect allows you to pay one instead), add any cost increases (such as kicker), then apply any cost reductions. The spell's mana value remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.

mainBoard.text:
Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
Scorching Lava deals 2 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, that creature can't be regenerated this turn and if it would die this turn, exile it instead.

mainBoard.flavorText: Hot wind whipped up as if the weather itself wanted to fight Phyrexians.

foreignData.flavorText: Les vents chauds fouettaient l'air comme s'ils cherchaient aussi à combattre les Phyrexians.
foreignData.name: Simoun
foreignData.text: Le Simoun inflige 1 blessure à chaque créature que l'adversaire ciblé contrôle.

foreignData.flavorText: Der heiße Wind sprang auf, als wollte das Wetter selber die Phyrexianer bekämpfen.
foreignData.name: Sifaka
foreignData.text: Der Sifaka fügt jeder Kreatur, die ein Gegner Deiner Wahl kontrolliert, 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

mainBoard.name: Simoon
mainBoard.originalText: Simoon deals 1 damage to each creature target opponent controls.
mainBoard.text: Simoon deals 1 damage to each creature target opponent controls.

foreignData.flavorText: Chair brûlée. Âme noircie.
foreignData.name: Roussissement
foreignData.text: Le Roussissement inflige 1 blessure à la créature ciblée. Cette créature devient noire jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: Verbranntes Fleisch, geschwärzte Seele.
foreignData.name: Versengung
foreignData.text: Versengung fügt einer Kreatur Deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu. Die Farbe dieser Kreatur wird bis zum Ende des Zuges zu Schwarz.

mainBoard.name: Singe
mainBoard.originalText: Singe deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature becomes black until end of turn.
mainBoard.text: Singe deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature becomes black until end of turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: To save Dominaria, nine planeswalkers sought the annihilation of Phyrexia itself.

foreignData.flavorText: Pour sauver Dominaria, neuf Arpenteurs pensèrent même à détruire Phyrexia.
foreignData.name: Implosion
foreignData.text:
Détruisez le terrain ciblé.
Piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: Um Dominaria zu retten, dachten neun Weltenwanderer daran, Phyrexia selber zu vernichten.
foreignData.name: Implodieren
foreignData.text:
Zerstöre ein Land Deiner Wahl.
Ziehe eine Karte.

mainBoard.name: Implode
mainBoard.originalText:
Destroy target land.
Draw a card.
